scripts.db:up: npx prisma migrate dev --name v0.1a && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.build:predeploy: npx prisma migrate dev --name v0.1a && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && next build
scripts.build:open: npx prisma migrate dev --name v0.1a && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && opennextjs-cloudflare build
scripts.preview: npm run db:up && opennextjs-cloudflare build && opennextjs-cloudflare preview
scripts.deploy: npx prisma migrate dev --name v0.1a && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && opennextjs-cloudflare build && opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
scripts.upload: npm run db:up && opennextjs-cloudflare build && opennextjs-cloudflare upload
